AI Description: R package that provides support for parallel execution of R code using various backends.
Core Features: Allows Users To Write Parallel Code In R Using A High-Level Foreach() Function, Supports Parallel Execution On Multiple Backends Such As Doparallel, Dosnow, Dompi, Domc, Doredis, Doazureparallel, Facilitates Easy Generation Of Parallel Iterations For Looping Over Elements
General Tags: R Package, Parallel Computing, Code Parallelization, High-Performance Computing
